H0.text: Whose fifth symphony is known as “The Reformation”. Beethoven

H1.text: Whose fifth symphony is known as “The Reformation”. Brahms

H2.text: Whose fifth symphony is known as “The Reformation”. Bruckner

H3.text: Whose fifth symphony is known as “The Reformation”. Mendelson

A4.text: The symphony has at times been nicknamed the 'Tragic', the 'Church of Faith' or the 'Pizzicato'.
